titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2587) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-263, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2587 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Bill is open to amendments. Makes in order amendments printed in the Rules Committee Report (H.Rept. 106-263) and waives all points of order against the amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 93.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 260.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: POSTPONED PROCEEDEINGS - The Chair put the question on agreeing to the resolution by voice vote and announced that the ayes had prevailed. The Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Subsequently, the Chair postponed further proceedings on H. Res. 260.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 201 (Roll no. 339).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/26/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2587 (District of Columbia government appropriations).
